an5.216:1.3: Bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanāpo, luddo ca hoti, vippaṭisārī ca, sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5.216:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
an5.216:2.3: Bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, aluddo ca hoti, avippaṭisārī ca, asammūḷho kālaṁ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.216:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā khantiyā”ti.
